To build a grid:
      1. Add a container
      2. Add a row
      3. Add a col with the sizing and breakpoint you want

Example: 
                            
<div class="container">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-3">
            <div class="bg-red text-center">
                Hello World!
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
Hello World!
